mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO student (id, user_name, nick_name ,sex, age, create_time) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{sex}, #{age},now())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_name = #{userName}, nick_name = #{nickName}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}

INSERT INTO hero (id, english_name, china_name ,hero_title, tags, image) VALUES (#{key}, #{id}, #{name}, #{title}, #{tags},#{image})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE english_name = #{id}, china_name = #{name}, hero_title = #{title}, tags = #{tags}, image = #{image}
